notes: invariable; often used with a preposition
example_sentence_italian: La persona cui scrivo vive a Roma.
example_sentence_english: The person to whom I write lives in Rome.

example_sentence_italian: L'amico a cui ho telefonato non risponde.
example_sentence_english: The friend to whom I phoned is not answering.

notes: often means 'about which' with certain verbs
example_sentence_italian: Il libro di cui ti ho parlato è qui.
example_sentence_english: The book of which I told you is here.

example_sentence_italian: La città da cui vengo è lontana.
example_sentence_english: The city from which I come is far away.

example_sentence_italian: La casa in cui vivo è piccola.
example_sentence_english: The house in which I live is small.

example_sentence_italian: La collega con cui lavoro è gentile.
example_sentence_english: The colleague with whom I work is kind.

example_sentence_italian: L'argomento su cui stiamo discutendo è serio.
example_sentence_english: The topic about which we are discussing is serious.

notes: also used colloquially as so/therefore; here relative meaning
example_sentence_italian: La ragione per cui sono in ritardo è il traffico.
example_sentence_english: The reason for which I am late is the traffic.

example_sentence_italian: Ho tre opzioni tra cui la tua.
example_sentence_english: I have three options among which is yours.

example_sentence_italian: È un amico senza cui non potrei vivere.
example_sentence_english: He is a friend without whom I could not live.
With whom are you going out tonight?
